item.title: 1 Secure Worker Mining and Staking
item.description: MathJax = { tex: { inlineMath: [['$', '$'], ['\\(', '\\)']], displayMath: [['$$','$$'], ['\\[', '\\]']], processEscapes: true, processEnvironments: true }, options: { skipHtmlTags: ['script', 'noscript', 'style', 'textarea', 'pre'] } }; window.addEventListener('load', (event) = { document.querySelectorAll("mjx-container").forEach(function(x){ x.parentElement.classList += 'has-jax'}) }); Introduction To secure the cloud of Workers and the jobs they are assigned, the network will set Confidence Level for each workerâ€™s CPU and will require Staking to enable mining.
